author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
1.2.2 2022-08-21 - added motionRetriggerInterval for T1 model; filter illuminance parsing for RTCGQ13LM
1.2.1 2022-08-10 - code cleanup; change device name on initialize
1.2.0 2022-07-29 - Aqara FP1 Human Presence Sensor support
1.1.5 2022-07-09 - when going offline the battery level is set to 0 (zero); when back online, the last known battery level is restored; when switching offline, motion is reset to 'inactive'; added digital and physical events type 
1.1.4 2022-07-08 - PowerSource presence polling; FP1 support improvements
1.1.1 2022-07-01 - added temperatureEvent;  RTCGQ13LM; RTCZCGQ11LM (FP1) inital support
1.0.0 2022-06-24 - first release version
